name: leaf noir (prototype)
description:
(leaf noir currently only loads in chrome -- we're working on a fix!)

i wish it could have lasted forever... but this fall was sure as the season. and just as beautiful.

a game by 🖳 tati, 🖳 kati, ✎raine, and ♫ craig.

CONTROLS: Use ARROW/WASD to gently turn the leaf, and let gravity do the rest.
Make small changes rather than holding and spinning out of control!

made in 72 hours for for mini jam 115.
theme: noir.
restriction: everything is temporary.
